successes.title: Help Find the Lonely Whale with Adrian Grenier & Josh Zeman
successes.description: Join Adrian Grenier, Josh Zeman & world renowned scientists to find the elusive '52 Hertz' whale and fight Ocean Noise Pollution.

Pledges.description: 52 RINGTONE
Welcome aboard! We're so glad to have you on the crew. In exchange for your donation, you will receive an exclusive 52 ringtone, recorded ON OUR QUEST for the loneliest whale.
Show your support with the Chocolate For Change (dark chocolate, sea salt) 52 bar for $7.
The '52' Ringtone will also be included.
UPDATES FROM THE CREW
Take part in the quest from the comfort of your home. Select this reward and we will send you digital updates from the icy waters of our quest.
TATTLY TEMPORARY WHALE TATTOOS (Set of 2 variety pack) + 52 Thank You Note

Let your commitment to ocean conservation be SEEN by all with this set of two whale temporary tattoos from Tattly. In the first tattoo by Aimée Wilder, add some fun to your look & show your love for lonely whale by sporting a whale splashing in a sea of hearts! In the second, wear this tastefully illustrated whale tattoo by Screech Owl Design and let the world see your support.
ADRIAN'S BOOK OF INSPIRATIONAL QUOTES TO LIVE BY
Need a little inspiration? Adrian Grenier would love to help. Select this reward and receive a digital booklet, full of Adrian's favorite quotes. Plus updates from the crew and the 52 ringtone.
LIMITED EDITION STONEY CLOVER LANE  BRACELET

Show your 52 pride with this bright and fun 52 bracelet with a blue whale cutout charm. Wearing the bracelet is not only stylish, it's also saving the ocean and its wildlife! Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
DIGITAL DOWNLOAD
Witness the quest for 52. Receive a digital copy of the film. Plus updates from the crew and the 52 ringtone.
52 MIXTAPE

Filmmaker Mike Ambs has compiled a mixtape of music inspired by and dedicated to 52.  Press play and become sonically connected with the loneliest whale like never before. Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
LIMITED EDITION RED COUSTEAU INSPIRED FRIEND OF 52 HAT

We couldn’t embark on this quest without paying homage to the man who revolutionized marine exploration and made all of this possible. Select this reward and get your very own Jacques Cousteau inspired “Friend of 52” hat. Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
SHEPARD FAIREY TEE

Famed artist Shepard Fairey created a graphic inspired by 52 that is available on this Tee shirt exclusively for our campaign. Now you can show off your love for the Lonely Whale in style. Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
TICKETS TO THE TIMES SQ TAKEOVER

Thanks to a generous gift from PVBLIC, Lonely Whale is taking over the digital billboards in Times Square -- and you're invited! The first ten backers who snatch up this reward will join us for this exciting evening at the W New York – Times Square (EWOW Suite) with Adrian Grenier and team, for a celebration of the culmination of a 2-day Times Square Takeover.
** Travel and accommodations not included.
SIGNED COPY OF DAVID ROTHENBERG'S "THOUSAND-MILE SONG"

Get your very own signed copy of legendary jazz clarinetist, philosopher-naturalist and composer David Rothenberg's acclaimed book, "Thousand-Mile Song: Whale Music in a Sea of Sound." Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
52: THE SEARCH POSTER

Decorate your walls with an authentic 52: Mystery of the Loneliest Whale movie poster, designed by Shepard Fairey (18x24). Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
HANDWRITTEN NOTE FROM ADRIAN GRENIER

Thank you for turning this dream into reality.  Select this reward, and Adrian will write you a personal, handwritten note, thanking you for your contribution. Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
VINT VIRGA'S "THE SOULS OF ALL LIVING CREATURES" SIGNED WITH A CUSTOM MESSAGE FROM THE AUTHOR

Receive a signed copy of veterinarian Vint Virga's acclaimed book, "The Soul of All Living Creatures: What Animals Can Teach Us About Being Human." Plus updates from the crew, the 52 ringtone and a digital download of the film.
LONELY WHALE NECKLACE by PROTECT WHAT IS PRECIOUS

This limited edition pendant evokes the spirit and sound of the Lonely Whale. Using an innovative process that extracts precious metals from industrial byproducts, this Protect What Is Precious recycled sterling silver design serves as a beautiful reminder of our connection to the ocean and the hope found in the story of 52. Retail price: $150.00
